com.dnastack.bob.client.impl

Interface BeaconNetworkClient


  • public interface BeaconNetworkClient
    Beacon Network API. All methods throw either operation specific exceptions or InternalException.

    • Method Summary

      • getResponses

        java.util.List<com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.BeaconResponseDto> getResponses(com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ChromosomeDto chromosome,
                                                                            java.lang.Long position,
                                                                            com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.AlleleDto allele,
                                                                            com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ReferenceDto reference,
                                                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> beaconsIds)
                                                                     throws ForbiddenException,
                                                                            InternalException,
                                                                            NotFoundException
        Requests specified beacons information on the specified genetic mutation.

        The response on the query will be put in BeaconResponseDto.response.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - true, when the response is YES.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - false or null, when the response is NO, or the beacon had problems answering the query.

        Parameters:
        chromosome - chromosome
        position - position
        allele - allele
        reference - assembly
        beaconsIds - ids of beacons to request. If not specified, all beacons will be requested.
        Returns:
        list of responses
        Throws:
        ForbiddenException
        NotFoundException
        InternalException

      • getResponse

        com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.BeaconResponseDto getResponse(com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ChromosomeDto chromosome,
                                                           java.lang.Long position,
                                                           com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.AlleleDto allele,
                                                           com.dnastack.bob.service.dto.ReferenceDto reference,
                                                           java.lang.String beaconId)
                                                    throws ForbiddenException,
                                                           NotFoundException,
                                                           InternalException
        Requests all beacons information on the specified genetic mutation.

        The response on the query will be put in BeaconResponseDto.response.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - true, when the response is YES.

        BeaconResponseDto.response - false or null, when the response is NO, or the beacon had problems answering the query.

        Parameters:
        chromosome - chromosome
        position - position
        allele - allele
        reference - assembly
        beaconId - ID of the beacon
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        ForbiddenException
        NotFoundException
        InternalException
